thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Julie McEliece

author: Julie McEliece
title: Julie McEliece
text:
Melissa was one of the best tour guides we, who have traveled and used Tours by Locals extensively, have ever had. Her college education, perfect English, sensitive awareness of the group, and total forthright honesty made this tour the cruise highlight. She even took us to the Batu caves when hundreds of locals were having a huge pilgrimage and keeping track of us alone was challenging. All 6 of us learned much and appreciated her energy and knowledge . Great tour!
Julie, USA
Feb 2017
